00011 #ifndef __AUDACITY_SAMPLE_FORMAT__

00014 #include "Audacity.h"
00015 #include <wx/defs.h>

00017 //
00018 // Definitions / Meta-Information
00019 //
00020 
00021 typedef enum {
00022    int16Sample = 0x00020001,
00023    int24Sample = 0x00040001,
00024    floatSample = 0x0004000F
00025 } sampleFormat;
00026 
00028 #define SAMPLE_SIZE(SampleFormat) (SampleFormat >> 16)
00029 
00030 #define SAMPLE_SIZE_DISK(SampleFormat) ((SampleFormat == int24Sample) ? \
00031    3 : SAMPLE_SIZE(SampleFormat) )
00032 
00033 typedef char *samplePtr;
00034 
00035 const wxChar *GetSampleFormatStr(sampleFormat format);
00036

00038 // Allocating/Freeing Samples
00039 //
00040 
00041 AUDACITY_DLL_API samplePtr NewSamples(int count, sampleFormat format);
00042 AUDACITY_DLL_API void DeleteSamples(samplePtr p);
00043 
00044 //
00045 // Copying, Converting and Clearing Samples
00046 //
00047 
00048 void      CopySamples(samplePtr src, sampleFormat srcFormat,
00049                       samplePtr dst, sampleFormat dstFormat,
00050                       unsigned int len, bool highQuality=true,
00051                       unsigned int stride=1);
00052 
00053 void      CopySamplesNoDither(samplePtr src, sampleFormat srcFormat,
00054                       samplePtr dst, sampleFormat dstFormat,
00055                       unsigned int len,
00056                       unsigned int stride=1);
00057                       
00058 void      ClearSamples(samplePtr buffer, sampleFormat format,
00059                        int start, int len);
00060 
00061 //
00062 // This must be called on startup and everytime new ditherers
00063 // are set in preferences.
00064 //
00065 
00066 void      InitDitherers();
